sentences.en: A big rescue operation has been launched for a trawler missing in the English Channel.
sentences.cn: 为寻找在英吉利海峡失踪的一艘拖网渔船，人们展开了一场大规模的搜救行动。

sentences.en: He and I were shipmates on a trawler once.
sentences.cn: 我与他一度同在一艘拖网船上工作.

sentences.en: His brother and I were shipmates on a trawler once.
sentences.cn: 我与他的哥哥曾在同一艘拖网渔船上工作.

sentences.en: Instead, a rusty trawler lies on its side on the forecourt, which the workmen eye as though a mongrel dog.
sentences.cn: 取而代之的是一条锈迹斑斑的拖网渔船，活像只一条腿歪在地上的杂种狗。

sentences.en: Last night the U - boat was towed by a trawler to Iceland.
sentences.cn: 昨晚那艘U潜艇被一艘拖网渔船拖到了冰岛.

sentences.en: One man was still missing last night after the Belgian trawler Lucky capsized off the Dutch coast. Three other men were saved.
sentences.cn: 昨晚比利时拖网渔船“幸运号”在荷兰海岸附近沉没后，仍有1人失踪，其余3人被救起。

sentences.en: The crew of the trawler were gathered below decks.
sentences.cn: 托网渔船上的船员被聚集到甲板下。

sentences.en: The heroic sergeant risked his life to rescue 29 fishermen from their blazing trawler.
sentences.cn: 英勇的中士冒着生命危险从熊熊燃烧着的拖网渔船上救出了29名渔民。

sentences.en: The trawler had sailed from the port of Zeebrugge.
sentences.cn: 拖网渔船已经驶离了泽布吕赫港。

sentences.en: The trawler was brought to anchor in the strait.
sentences.cn: 那艘拖网渔船在离海岸不远处停下来抛锚.

trans.tran_cn: 拖网渔船，拖网捕鱼者，拖网渔民
trans.tran_en: a fishing boat that uses a trawl net
